full_threads.body:
Hi Keenan, 

The below changes have been made and will make the migration cut over. 
https://acoufelt.com/au/home-new-june-10/
@heath updating the new homepage: https://acoufelt.com/au/home-new-june-10/

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hey team, Sorry for the delay. A couple of tweaks to be made.
  • Hero headline on the video shift return 'ears and' and can that sentence be spaced a little less? (see attached design for example of style)
  • Please add a small TM after Making Quiet in the below sub heading
  • Add 'Featured Project' above the project sliders (attached design showing example)
  • Update second slider text to' 'WoodBeQuiet™' (big text) - 'Series of acoustic products printed to appear like real wood' (little text)
  • Remove the word 'Our' from 'Our Projects' so it says 'Projects'
  • News 'Read More' buttons text to change to Core Sans and can we shift return the second story text so the buttons all align at the base
And that's it! Warm regards, Keenan Druce Graphic Designer T +61 1800 626 462 Level 43, Australia Square, Sydney NSW 2000 acoufelt.com

Thanks so much Heath,

We have a few tweaks to make which I hope to get you ether tomorrow or Monday

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce

Graphic Designer



T +61 1800 626 462

Level 43, Australia Square, Sydney NSW 2000

acoufelt.com

Hi Keenan, 

Thanks for reviewing, confirming we have made the updates for you:
https://acoufelt.com/au/home-new-june-10/

Please let us know if you need anything else.

Morning team, Thanks so much for doing this so quickly. There are just a few minor updates to make which I have attached but also just a few dot points below
  • Forestone project isn't linking and goes to a 404 page
  • I noticed when I had a look on mobile that the video disappears which is fine but the grey image that replaces it needs replacing. Can you update with the attached but also ensure that this image only appears when the video won't play due to the boundaries of the website
  • Update hero video (https://www.dropbox.com/s/9oi3tzvd95e5ale/Acoufelt%20-%20Edit%20for%20Website.mp4?dl=0)
Great job team! If there are any issues with the changes please let me know Warm regards, Keenan Druce Graphic Designer T +61 1800 626 462 Level 43, Australia Square, Sydney NSW 2000 acoufelt.com

Thanks Heath,
